Title: The Twelve Tasks of Asterix
Director: René Goscinny, Henri Gruel, Albert Uderzo, Pierre Watrin
Writer: René Goscinny (story), Albert Uderzo (story), René Goscinny (screenplay), Albert Uderzo (screenplay), Pierre Tchernia (screenplay collaboration)
Actors: Roger Carel, Jacques Morel, Pierre Tornade, Henri Labussière
Plot: When Julius Cesar fears, that he will probably never be able to defeat the gaulic village of Asterix and his friends, he has the idea of offering the Gauls a deal: if they are able to solve twelve tasks that he selected, he will hand over the Roman empire to them. If not, they have to submit.
Production: Dargaud Films, Les Productions René Goscinny, Studios Idefix
